meanings.definition: A large ship designed to carry containers.
meanings.sent1: The containership sailed across the ocean with ease.
meanings.sent2: The containership docked at the port to unload its cargo.
meanings.sent3: Why did the containership refuse to carry any more containers? It was feeling too boxed in!
meanings.sent4: The containership cut through the waves like a giant metal whale.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the containership against the sunset was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: The act of transporting goods in containers by ship.
meanings.sent1: Global trade relies heavily on containership for efficient transportation.
meanings.sent2: The containership industry plays a crucial role in the economy.
meanings.sent3: When the containership started dancing, everyone was amazed by its smooth moves.
meanings.sent4: The idea of using containership as a metaphor for unity resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The containership's journey symbolized the interconnectedness of nations.
